claim: Today, professional wrestler Alberto del Río announced that he left WWE for the second time, just when he was in the middle of a suspension caused by the abuse of certain substances necessary in his relationship with the also fighter, Paige. Del Rio, in a press conference, said that his reason is that he did not feel comfortable working full time, and that he plans to retire in a couple of years after fighting some sixty times more. However, in his tireless search for information truthfulness, El managed to extract the truth from the Potosino.'Yeah, seriously, what happens is that Televisa offered me a Sunday program. They want me to be the new Chabelo.". “Why is another Chabelo, if Chabelo is eternal?” we ask. “ Yes, but since he wants to engage in other activities for a few decades, he told me to cover it, because the ratings of the channel  have gone down since his program was suspended. Del Rio confessed that he has been training with Chabelo for months in the basements of Chapultepec Castle in order to capture the best of the character.'I know what's up with the cataphixies, with the contests and with Troncoso Furniture. It's all a matter of giving me the green light, and we're starting, like,'. In addition to Paige being the only teacher in the program, another notable change is that Del Rio won't use the word'Now when some child loses the competitions, I'll tell him: You miss, perrooo..!", he finished. I'm sorry.
